properties.areaDesc: Monroe; Taylor; Pike; Talbot; Upson; Lamar; Crawford
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 5:21AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 521 AM EST...a strong thunderstorm was over Prattsburg, or 8 miles
northeast of Talbotton...moving northeast at 30 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of this storm include
Thomaston, Barnesville, Roberta, Milner, Yatesville, Junction City,
Culloden, Aldora, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock,
Russellville, Howard, Logtown, Salem, Prattsburg, Hannahs Mill, Big
Lazer Creek Wma, Wesley Church and Fickling Mill.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR LAMAR...SOUTHWESTERN MONROE... NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR...UPSON...NORTHWESTERN CRAWFORD...EASTERN TALBOT AND SOUTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES UNTIL 600 AM EST
